contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[company (law)|companies]] from [[Romania]]'''. <!-- Note: Wikipedia is not a web directory. Do not add URL's. Add only listed companies or Public sector companies or notable firms. See WP:CORP for establishing notability. To ensure the company you are adding has met Wikipedia's policy on notability (see Wikipedia:Notability), write the article first and then link to it here. All redlinks will be removed by a regular patrol of the list. --> == Telecommunications == * [[UPC Romania]] * [[Orange Romania]] * [[Vodafone Romania]] * [[Cosmote Romania]] * [[RCS&RDS]] * [[Romtelecom]] * [[Zapp Mobile|Telemobil]] == Media == * [[Adevărul Holding]] * [[Realitatea-Caţavencu]] * [[Intact Media Group]] == Software == * [[Trilulilu]] * [[Ubisoft Romania]] * [[Softwin]] * [[GeCAD Software]] * [[SIVECO Romania]] * [[Softpedia]] == Insurance == * [[Banca Transilvania|BT Asigurări]] == Banking == {{main|List of Romanian banks}} * [[Banca Transilvania]] * [[Banca Comercială Română]] (BCR) * [[BRD – Groupe Société Générale]] * [[Raiffeisen Romania]] == Securities == * [[Banca Transilvania|BT Securities]] == Energy == * [[Rompetrol]] * [[Petrom]] - owned by Austrian [[OMV AG]] == Conglomerates == * [[Țiriac Holdings]] * [[UTI Holdings]] * [[Rompetrol]] * [[Romstal]] == Transportation == * [[Căile Ferate Române]] * [[TAROM]] * [[Carpatair]] * [[Blue Air]] * [[Metrorex]] * [[Regiotrans]] * [[Transferoviar Grup]] * [[Grup Feroviar Român]] == Travel & leisure == * [[Continental Hotels]] == Pharma & Biotechnology == * [[Terapia Ranbaxy]] * [[Zentiva]] * [[Antibiotice Iaşi]] == Industry == * [[Arctic S.A.]] * [[Automobile Dacia]] * [[Daewoo Mangalia Heavy Industries]] == Retail == * [[Mobexpert]] * [[Angst (supermarket)|Angst]] * [[Mega Image]] * [[Dedeman]] == Porcelain == * [[Apulum (company)|Apulum]] == Textile == * [[Jolidon]] == Food & beverage industry == * [[Napolact]] * [[European Drinks & Foods]] * [[Ursus Breweries]] ==See also== * [[List of supermarket chains in Romania]]'' [[Category:Companies based in Cluj-Napoca|*]] {{Economy of Romania}} {{Europe topic|List of companies of}} [[Category:Lists of companies by country|Romania]] [[Category:Companies of Romania|*]] [[Category:Lists of companies of Romania|*]]
